item.title: Linksharing Service
item.description: Linksharing Service # Overview # The Linksharing service provides an easy way to share an object via a web browser. Linkshare links may be shared with the following features: Storj DCS Linkshare web page - displays a preview of the shared object, including a streaming player for multimedia files along with a map displaying the geolocation of the storage nodes storing the encrypted and erasure coded pieces of the object Path-based linkshare - displays a list of objects with a shared path in a browser.
